= Download and installation instructions =

== Subversion ==

The recommended way to install kruX is via the subversion system. If you are unfamiliar with this, see [http://subversion.apache.org/packages.html here] for a list of relevant software clients. Detailed instructions for how to checkout kruX can be found under the [https://code.google.com/p/krux/source/checkout Source] tab.
